snippet: Spelman College, facing money and logistical problems, is withdrawing from intercollegiate athletics and will focus on a wellness program to promote exercise and better nutrition.
abstract: Spelman College, historically black women's school in Atlanta, is withdrawing from intercollegiate athletics and will focus on wellness program to promote exercise and better nutrition; decision is motivated by school's money and logistical problems, but also by  concern for health of population it serves.
lead_paragraph: Spelman College, facing money and logistical problems, is withdrawing from intercollegiate athletics and will focus on a wellness program to promote exercise and better nutrition.

headline.main: Spelman Drops Sports to Turn Focus on Fitness
headline.print_headline: Spelman Drops Sports To Turn Focus On Fitness
